entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:32 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
